title: Checkbox & Radio
description: Checkbox and radio button components for selection options.

checkbox.title: Checkbox
checkbox.description: Checkbox is an input element that allows multiple options to be selected.

indeterminate.title: Indeterminate State
indeterminate.description: Checkbox can have an indeterminate state. This can be set using JavaScript.

radio.title: Radio Button
radio.description: Radio button is an input element that allows only one option to be selected from multiple choices.

checkboxGroup.title: Checkbox Group
checkboxGroup.description: Multiple checkboxes can be grouped together.

radioGroup.title: Radio Group
radioGroup.description: Multiple radio buttons can be grouped together.

scss.title: SCSS Styling
scss.description: You can apply checkbox and radio styles using podo-ui mixins.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Appropriate styles are automatically applied in dark mode.
